properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
1. 7.5 METER VESSEL MANDAL, WHITE HULL WITH RED STRIPES,
   THREE PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
   DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE VICINITY 14-00N 064-00W.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
   MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, TELEX: 42912008,
   PHONE: 59 659 670 9292, FAX: 59 659 663 2450.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 50/13.
